amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Drug Courts Program by $30 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 55 in the Congressional Record of September 23, 1997 to decrease by $30 million the State Prison Grant program and to increase funding for the federal drug courts program commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 259 (Roll no. 445).
